alert.note: Alert for Cochise (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 5:01PM MST until July 27 at 5:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Cochise County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 545 PM MST. * At 500 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Pearce-Sunsites, or 14 miles south of Willcox, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pearce-Sunsites and Kansas Settlement. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
